header.name: boost/log/support/date_time.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
07.11.2012
This header enables Boost.DateTime support for Boost.Log.

header.name: boost/log/support/exception.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
18.07.2009
This header enables Boost.Exception support for Boost.Log.

description.para: The function returns an error information object that contains current stack of scopes. This information can then be attached to an exception and extracted at the catch site. The extracted scope list won't be affected by any scope changes that may happen during the exception propagation.

note.para: See the named_scope attribute documentation on how to maintain scope list.
